patterns: Make a funeral or life insurance claim
How to make a claim for funeral insurance?

responses.default: To make a funeral or life insurance claim, please submit the required documents and details. You can start the claim process by visiting our website or contacting our customer support.

To make a withdrawal, you can log in to your account and initiate a withdrawal request. Alternatively, you can visit one of our branches and speak to our customer service representatives for assistance.
To view the list of products under your account, you can log in to your online banking portal or mobile app. There you will find the details of all your registered products.

patterns: How much is in my retirement savings?

responses.default: To view your employment retirement savings, you can log in to your retirement fund account or contact our retirement savings department. They will provide you with the necessary information regarding your retirement fund balance.

patterns: Download Retirement Fund Forms and guides
Old Mutual Multi-Managers Investment Election form

responses.default: To retrieve your documents, you can log in to your account and navigate to the document section. There you will find all the necessary documents related to your account, policies, and transactions.

patterns: How does Old Mutual Rewards work?

responses.default: Old Mutual Rewards is our loyalty program where you can earn points for your interactions and transactions with us. These points can be redeemed for various rewards and benefits. To learn more about Old Mutual Rewards, please visit our website or contact our customer support.

patterns: How to apply for a new product?

responses.default: To apply for our products, you can visit our website and explore the product pages. There you will find the application forms and instructions to apply for the desired products. You can also contact our customer support for assistance with the application process.
